revised_title: A Yearly Register of Barometer, Thermometer, and Rain in Lyndon, Rutland, 1774
tldr: This article presents a detailed record of the barometer, thermometer, and rainfall in Lyndon, Rutland, for the year 1774. The author, Thomas Barker, also provides a comparison of the wettest months and discusses the impact of the weather on crops and livestock. The article highlights the challenges faced during the harvest season due to heavy rainfall and the overall impact of the weather on the local environment.
